dcterms:creator: Seungjun Nah

dcterms:description: The REDS dataset is used for video deblurring and super-resolution, containing a total of 300 video sequences, with 240 for training, 30 for validation, and 30 for testing. Each sequence consists of 100 frames with a resolution of 720 × 1280.
dcterms:title: REDS

dcterms:creator: Tianfan Xue
Baian Chen
Jiajun Wu
Donglai Wei
William T Freeman
dcterms:description: The Vimeo-90K dataset contains 64,612 sequences for training and 7,824 for testing, with each sequence consisting of seven frames at a resolution of 448 × 256.
dcterms:title: Vimeo-90K

dcterms:creator: Ce Liu
Deqing Sun
dcterms:description: Vid4 is a dataset used for video super-resolution, consisting of four video sequences that are commonly used for benchmarking.
dcterms:title: Vid4

dcterms:creator: Peng Yi
Zhongyuan Wang
Kui Jiang
Junjun Jiang
Jiayi Ma
dcterms:description: UDM10 is a dataset for video super-resolution that focuses on progressive fusion via exploiting non-local spatio-temporal correlations.
dcterms:title: UDM10
